Name: Wartor-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise.  Swap a Wartor-Claw and a Wartor-Fang for a Wartor-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
